featured.text: The English first ridiculed forks as being unnecessary.

other.text: You know how to avoid unnecessary activities!
taking time to understand and respect each other, we become demanding, resentful, judgmental, and intolerant. __(36)__, our relationships are filled with unnecessary disagreements and conflicts.

definition.example: The extra decorations were unnecessary for the simple event.
